divs: Sighting DetailsAs I left my house headed for work I drove north on Golden Meadow road in Greenwood, Louisiana. I could see a cross shaped object above the road ahead. I thought it may be a helicopter and thought it was very low. It had lights all bright white up and down and multicolored lights on the crossbar. It was low enough and bright enough to light up the trees and foliage on either side of the road. It made no noise. I was afraid to drive under it but had to to get to work. I drove under the object and it hovered there without any sound. I watched it in my rear view mirror and it was still there as I drove out of sight.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Greenwood
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: multi colored cross hovered over roadway
